title: Thian chuti ang ka hriat hmaa
lyrics:
Thian chuti-ang ka hriat hmaa
Min hmangaihtu ka hmu ta;
Hmangaihna kutinn min vuan a,
A hnenah min hruai ta a.
Ka thinlung chhungril berah chuan,
Hmangaih hruiin min phuar ta;
Ka ta a ni, a ta ka ni,
Chatuan, chatuan, chatuan.

Thian chuti-ang min tlan tura
Thisen chhuaka thi ka hmu;
Nunna chauh chu min pe lovin,
Amah ka tan a inpe.
Eng mah reng ka ta ka ti lo,
Min petu tan zawk a ni;
Thlarau, nunna leh ka engkim,
Chatuanin ka ta a ni.

Thian chuti-ang, nunnem, zaidam,
Roreltu fing, Chhanhimtu;
Thutaka min hruaitu ropui,
Chatuan Pa chu ka hmu ta.
Min hmangaihtu hnen ata chu,
Engin nge min then thei ang?
Nunna, thihna, lei, hremhmun maw?
Hnai lo, a ta fo ka ni.
